comment: Amazing food! The butter chicken is to die for. Service was excellent and the ambiance is perfect for a family dinner.
Good food but a bit pricey. The naan bread is fresh and delicious. Would recommend for special occasions.
Best salon in Lagos! Nkoyo did an amazing job with my braids. Very professional and patient. Will definitely be back!
Great service and friendly staff. The salon is clean and well-maintained. Only downside is it can get busy on weekends.
Excellent medical facility. The doctors are knowledgeable and caring. The lab results are always accurate and timely.
Good hospital with modern equipment. The wait time can be long during peak hours, but the service is worth it.
Fixed my car's brake issue quickly and at a fair price. The mechanics are honest and professional. Highly recommend!
HomeFix came same day to fix my leaking pipe. The plumber was professional and cleaned up after the job. Great service!
Perfect date night spot! The food is exquisite and the wine selection is impressive. Service is top-notch.
Beautiful salon with talented stylists. Got my hair and nails done for a wedding. Looked amazing!
Great clinic for families. The pediatrician is wonderful with kids. Clean facility and friendly staff.
Quick and affordable service. Got my oil changed in 30 minutes. No complaints!
ProClean did an excellent job cleaning my apartment. Very thorough and used eco-friendly products. Highly recommend!
